name: unassigned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not given to or kept for a particular person or purpose: The apartment complex offers tenants ample, unassigned parking. The lead roles for Romeo and Juliet are still unassigned. The two remaining seats in Row 8 were unassigned.
More examplesFewer examplesThose of us who are unassigned to a specific project have been asked to take two weeks' unpaid time off each month.With unassigned seating, you can sit where you want.Oklahoma became the nation's 46th state, after unassigned lands were divided for settlement.There would be little trouble in finding someone to take up the unassigned bonds.
